模块 mxlib.api
程序包 cn.mcres.karlatemp.mxlib.remote

类 RemoteServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.mcres.karlatemp.mxlib.remote.RemoteServer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class RemoteServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Net Work Server.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RemoteServer

        public RemoteServer​(@Nullable
                    @Nullable java.security.KeyPair rsa)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Create a server with rsa encoded.
        参数:
        rsa - The rsa key.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If cannot create a ServerSocketChannel and Selector

      • RemoteServer

             throws java.io.IOException
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • RemoteServer

        public RemoteServer​(@NotNull
                    @NotNull java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel server,
                    @NotNull
                    @NotNull java.nio.channels.Selector selector,
                    @Nullable
                    @Nullable java.security.KeyPair rsa)
        Create a server.
        参数:
        server - The Server Socket
        selector - The selector using
        rsa - The rsa key. 'null' to disable.

    • 方法详细资料

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Close selector and server.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.io.Closeable
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Error IN closing selector or server.

      • getServer

        @Contract(pure=true)
public java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel getServer()

      • getSelector

        @Contract(pure=true)
public java.nio.channels.Selector getSelector()

      • accept

        @Nullable
@Contract(pure=true)
public @Nullable RemoteConnection accept()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Accept a connect. The reason we set the pure to true is that you want to add the event handler.
        返回:
        null or the remote connection
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IO Error
        另请参阅:
        RemoteConnection, RemoteConnection.getHandlerList()

      • select

        public void select()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Waiting for connected data and processing it

        Please execute this method in a new thread, or execute it in ExecutorService 

        
 RemoteServer server = new RemoteServer();
 server.getServer().socket().bind(new InetSocketAddress(23333));
 new Thread(()->{
      while(server.isOpen()){
          try{
              server.select();
          } catch (IOException ignore){}
      }
 }).start();
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IOException

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
